attributes.action: Actually take notice of these petitions
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I have signed up to many of these petitions, but when I get an answer it's always along the lines of 'Yes it's very nice, but this is how it's done'. I feel that the government isn't taking notice of these petitions whatsoever. Apart from voting, this is the closest I and many people will ever be to taking part in politics. Therefore I feel that it is important for the government to take notice of our views.

rejection.details: Comments about the petitions system should be sent to team@petitions.pm.gov.uk.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
